title: Bug 47910 - ajc outjar jarfile does not contain MANIFEST.MF
description: A bug was discovered where the output jar file generated by ajc does not contain the expected MANIFEST.MF file, even though there is a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file present inside the source directory.
OB: When using ajc to create an output jar file using the outjar option, the resulting file does not include the MANIFEST.MF file from the source directory.
EB: If the outjar option is used with ajc, the resulting file should be a valid jar file that includes the MANIFEST.MF file from the source directory.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Create a source directory with a METAINF/MANIFEST.MF file inside.
2. Execute ajc with the outjar option to generate an output jar file.
3. Verify that the resulting jar file does not contain the MANIFEST.MF file from the source directory.
